Sentiments.Phrase: I need ya to do somethin’ for me.
You’ve been workin’ at the station for a few months now, and as your
You got some witnesses comin’ in soon, and I need ‘em to take the fall for some... things.
If you understand what I’m saying, go ahead and
this message, and record my name, and the word rewind.

Hints: Try pressing the record button when Frank says his name to record his name.
You can use the rewind button if you need to try again.
